N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 507.6 - Standards pertaining to funding

State Regulations
(a) Funding for this expansion of the community based service system is limited to
the amount appropriated on an annual basis to the Office of Mental Health for
such purposes and to the amount awarded to the locality. Such funding may
continue on an annual basis with the approval of the Office of Mental

Health. (b) Funding shall be a
grant for 100 percent of the net deficit cost of a program or part of a program
that has been approved by the Office of Mental Health to serve children with
serious emotional disturbance in the community based service system. Each
locality receiving a grant will be responsible for assuring that revenue
available from other sources has been claimed and used to reduce the net
deficit amount. (c) Funding shall
be solely awarded to the local governmental unit. Such funding may be
contracted to other service providers or individuals by the local governmental
unit with approval from the Office of Mental Health. The local governmental
unit must demonstrate to OMH that the contractor has the capacity to provide
effective services to children. (d) Funding shall be for new and expanded services. Each local governmental unit
receiving grant funds must submit a statement that the ECS funding will not be
used to supplant existing local funding. The local contributions for
expenditures in any local fiscal year for local or unified services provided to
children with serious emotional disturbance in accordance with this Part, as
applicable, must remain equal to or greater than the amount expended by such
local governmental unit in the last complete fiscal year preceding the
effective date of this Part. (e) Calculation of such expenditures shall be based upon maintenance of the
following: (1)
levels of staffing; or
(2)
number of children receiving
services; or
(3)
number of service
visits; or
(4)
amount allocated for
specific children's services. (f) The local governmental unit shall be
responsible for determining the current local contribution, the intent to
maintain that level and the methodology for monitoring the local level of
expenditure for the community based service system for children with serious
emotional disturbance. The local governmental calculation and methodology must
be approved by the Office of Mental Health prior to the grant award. Annual
updates shall be required. (g) The
local governmental unit and any provider of service participating in the
community based service system shall be responsible for participation in any
evaluation of the services or audit of expenditures undertaken by this
funding. Notes
